description_html: Wove delivers a new level of style and performance to projects at every budget level. Rendered in 100% solution dyed nylon, Wove’s extremely tight tuft binds make it ideal for high traffic applications as well as any project under budget pressure. Its unique construction puts in a category between carpet and hard surface. In places where LVT is a slip hazard and traditional carpet isn't warranted, Wove brings category defining style and performance Three coordinates, Wove Lock, Wove Extension, and Wove Perm offer complimentary options effective in groups or alone. Wove performs equally well in broadloom, square and plank tiles. Available in 7 usable running line colors, it is easily customizable to coordinate with virtually any Totally product.
